      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • removeFromOrder

      public int removeFromOrder(int tableNo, int itemId, int quantity)
      remove Item/Promotion objects from the order of table tableNo
      Parameters:
      tableNo - the tableNo that has the order need to process
      itemId - id of the Item/Promotion to be removed
      quantity - number of Promotion object to remove
      Returns:
      2 if they are removed normally
